issue.title: [C++] Add RoundTrip to Relations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16854](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16854). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the effort solving https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16496, the tasks have been structured into a set of tasks. The focus of this task is to provide the `ToProto` function for relations in Substrait. This task will include a set of child tasks which include a set of relations added in each child task.

To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
